refnamediv.refpurpose: Instruments some macros to store runtime information on code coverage and execution time

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: covStart(paths covStart(lib) covStart([path ; lib]) covStart(macro) covStart("all")

listitem.para: a library or a string which is a library name
a specific function (as a string name or a function value)
special argument to instrument all the loaded macros

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Instruments the passed arguments to store runtime informations on execution. These informations can be latter exported by calling covWrite. To remove any instrumentation data covStop can be used.

You can either select a set of function or all the available one on a specific call. The "all" analysis is useful to have a global overview and later specific informations can be produced for one or a set of identified functions.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: covStart(isempty) // instrument isempty by macro value for i=1:1e5; isempty(i); end // run covWrite("html", "TMPDIR/coverage") // write runtime information to a directory covStop(); // remove any instrumentation
